title: How are fans honoring Mac Miller's legacy? - Quora

response.answer_text: Fans from All over the World are honoring Mac Miller’s legacy in quite a few ways (Mac Miller died on September 7, 2018). In Pittsburgh, Fans held Listening Parties for the late rapper’s new posthumous album “Circles” as well as pop-up exhibits produced by Mirrored Media that pays tribute to him.Source: Mac Miller Fans Honor Late Rapper With Listening Parties Across Pittsburgh..

I'm not a Mac Miller fan, so I couldn't tell you, honestly. All I know for sure is that Ariana Grande is still hurting very much because of his passing. She's even had to cancel shows due to grief-related anxiety and depression. It's very sad.
